Alle Klassen und Schnittstellen

Klasse
Beschreibung
Direction
Directions are all posible movements for the rover.
Display
The Display is a singleton that displays information in abox as a console.
Gestein
The stone can be taken by a rover for but it cannot be placed again.
Huegel
The hill is an obstcale that the rover cannot drive over.
Marker
A marker that can be placed by the rover to mark locations.
MessagePriority
An enumeration representing the priority levels of messages.
Planet
The planet is the place where the actors can operate.
Portal
A portal can be placed in the world to teleport actors to another portal.
Rover
The rover is a movable object that can be controlled by driving and turning.
